sentences: Mõistame, et see on raske otsus.
context: The word 'mõistate' is the second person plural (formal) present indicative form of the verb 'mõistma', which means 'to understand'. It is commonly used in formal or polite address when speaking to multiple people. The root stem '-t-' indicates it's part of the verb conjugation pattern for this tense and person.
